data.title: ‘Trap House’: This is what you may want to know about plot, cast, director and production
data.meta_description: Trap House follows an undercover DEA agent and his partner in El Paso, Texas, as they face off against a group of teenagers robbing from a dangerous cartel. Using their parents' tactics and top-secret intel, the teens are a formidable challenge in this high-stakes game of cat and mouse.
data.text:
Synopsis

Trap House follows an undercover DEA agent and his partner in El Paso, Texas, as they face off against a group of teenagers robbing from a dangerous cartel. Using their parents' tactics and top-secret intel, the teens are a formidable challenge in this high-stakes game of cat and mouse.

Jack Champion, Sophia Lillis, Kate del Castillo, Tony Dalton, Whitney Peak, and Bobby Cannavale have signed on to join Dave Bautista in the upcoming action thriller Trap House. The film, which is currently in production, is directed by Michael Dowse from a script by Gary Scott Thompson and Tom O’Connor.

Plot

The story revolves around an undercover DEA agent and his partner in El Paso, Texas, who find themselves in a high-stakes game of cat and mouse with a group of rebellious teenagers. These teens are robbing from a dangerous cartel and using their parents’ tactics and top-secret intel to pull off their heists.

Cast and Production

In addition to the star-studded cast, Trap House features Inde Navarrette, Zaire Adams, and Blu del Barrio. The film is produced by Marc Goldberg, Sarah Gabriel, Michael Pruss, and Rebecca Feuer, with Ridley Scott serving as an executive producer alongside Bautista, Jonathan Meisner and Todd Lundbohm.

The film is a collaboration between Bautista's production banner, Dogbone, and Signature Films, with financing from Capstone Studios, Signature Entertainment, Creativity Media, Koala, and Ashland Hill Finance.

Director

Director Michael Dowse, known for Fubar and Goon, is helming the project.

FAQs:

Who are the main cast members joining Dave Bautista in the action thriller Trap House?

Jack Champion, Sophia Lillis, Kate del Castillo, Tony Dalton, Whitney Peak and Bobby Cannavale are joining Bautista in Trap House.

Who is directing 'Trap House' and what is their background?

Michael Dowse is directing 'Trap House.' Known for projects like 'Fubar' and 'Goon,' Dowse brings experience in delivering engaging and action-packed productions.
